characters.story: The gold stands for think highly of, singing "Chin!" cheerfully!
"Poh!" Dividing with a sword sang cheerfully - cut open, dissect and split!
The heart stands for bodhisattva, asking "Poo? Enlightened?" curiously!
The strokes unite to show mango, asking "Mahng? Fruit?" curiously!
See how the river forms wasteland? It sings "Hwahng!" cheerfully!
This character represents lie, whispering "Hwahng" softly - a vivid image to remember!
When the people meets the water, they form boundless, asking "Mahng? Vast?" curiously!
See how the shellfish forms win? It asks "Ying? Victory?" curiously!
The strokes unite to show interrogate, shouting "Shyoon!" sharply!
See how the soil forms workshop? It asks "Fahng? Workplace?" curiously!
The strokes unite to show aromatic, singing "Fahng!" cheerfully!
This character represents call on, whispering "Fahng" softly!
"Ao, should we simmer?" Turkey on cooking fire questioned stewing curiously - boil and endure!
The strokes unite to show tobacco, singing "Yan!" cheerfully!
Like a tree, this character means roster and whispers "Bahng"!
The stone stands for pound, shouting "Bahng!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
The body takes the shape of upper arm, whispering "Bahng" softly!
